惾字的基本解释

惾
zōng
塞，壅塞：“五臭熏鼻，困惾中颡。”

惾字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zōng］
［《集韻》祖叢切，平東，精。］
壅塞。《庄子·天地》：“且夫失性有五……三曰五臭薰鼻，困惾中顙。”成玄英疏：“惾，塞也……言鼻耽五臭，故壅塞不通而中傷顙額也。”一说，犹冲。陈鼓应注：“'惾'讀衝，襲刺之意。”

惾字的康熙字典解释

【卯集上】【心字部】　惾； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页393第15
【集韻】祖叢切，音騣。刻賊不通也。　又先奏切，音漱。困惾，氣臭，熏鼻不通也。【莊子·天地篇】五臭熏鼻，困惾中顙。【註】困惾，衝逆人也。

惾字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
惾字的起名意思

暂无。

Sad
Basic explanation of words
Sad
zōng
Stuffed, congested: "Five smelly nose, sleepy and sullen."
Sad
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zōng］
["Jiyun" Zu Congqie, Pingdong, Jing. ]
Congestion. "Zhuangzi Tiandi": "There are five deprivation of sex in a husband... The third is five smelly nose, sleepy and sullen." Cheng Xuanying Shu: "Sorry, congestion also... the nose delays the five smells, so the congestion is unreasonable and slanderous. Yeah." I said, still rushing. Chen Gu Ying's note: "'Xiao' read Chong, the meaning of attacking assassination."
Sad
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Mao Ji 1] [Heart Word Department] 　惾; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 393 15
【Jiyun】The ancestors cut, the sound is delicious. Engraved thief has nowhere.　Play cut again first, sound rinse. Sleepy, smelly, and smoky nose is also impassable. 【Zhuangzi·Heaven and Earth】Five smelly noses, sleepy and sluggish. [Note] Sleepy, rushing to others.
